title: 6 Dec, 6 bombs, 6 cities: JeM module planned serial blasts; wanted to ‘avenge’ Babri demolition

Investigators are probing their financial chain and command structure, with potential links to a recent car blast in New Delhi.

'5-phase plan’: How Al-Falah doctors built nationwide plot to 'avenge' Babri demolition
description: A chilling plot to unleash coordinated blasts in six cities on December 6, the Babri Masjid demolition anniversary, has been uncovered by investigators. Arrested members of a Jaish-e-Mohammad-linked module revealed plans to "avenge" the 1992 event, with a five-phase strategy involving IED assembly and target reconnaissance. Security has been heightened across multiple regions.

title: 'She's keeping it confidential': Taylor Swift planning surprise for Travis Kelce
description: Taylor Swift's upcoming documentary, 'The End of an Era,' offers a glimpse into her Eras Tour and her romance with Travis Kelce.  Rumors suggest Swift is also penning a film inspired by their relationship, a modern 'Romeo & Juliet.'  While details remain secret, fans anticipate insights into Swift's creative process and personal life.

title: Rajasthan teen peering out of bus window to spit gutkha collides with ambulance, decapitated
description: A 17-year-old boy tragically died after his neck was severed when he leaned out of a bus window to spit gutkha, colliding with an oncoming government veterinary ambulance. The horrific accident occurred on Chohtan Road in Barmer district, leading to immediate death and chaos on the bus. The boy was traveling to Barmer to fetch medicine for his ailing father.

title: Watch: B'luru techie rams scooter, attempts to kill family of 3; arrested
description: A Bengaluru techie, Sukruth Gowda, has been arrested for attempted murder following a road rage incident. He allegedly rammed his car into a couple and their son's scooter after a dispute over space at a signal. The victims were hospitalized, with the father requiring further treatment. Police identified the accused through CCTV footage and his subsequent confession.

title: NHL Trade Rumors: Doug Armstrong faces calls on Schenn, Kyrou, Thompson
description: Trade rumors swirl around the St. Louis Blues as GM Doug Armstrong signals openness to deals. Players like Schenn and Kyrou are subjects of speculation. Meanwhile, Buffalo Sabres are firm on keeping star player Tage Thompson. The Blues are expected to make adjustments, but a complete overhaul is unlikely. Thompson remains a core part of Buffalo's future plans.

title: Anta bypoll 2025 result: BJP’s Morpal Suman leads in early trends
description: The Anta Assembly by-election in Rajasthan sees a direct contest between Congress candidate Pramod Jain Bhaya and BJP's Morpal Suman, with Congress rebel Naresh Meena also in the fray. The bypoll, held after the disqualification of a BJP MLA, recorded a high voter turnout of 80.21%.

title: Bihar election results: Key fights to watch out for; big verdict today
description: Bihar's high-stakes elections conclude with results due Friday. Exit polls hint at an NDA return, with all eyes on the counting. The article highlights key constituencies like Raghopur, Madhepura, and Alinagar, featuring prominent political figures and intriguing contests.  Internal INDIA bloc 'friendly fights' between Congress and RJD/CPI(ML) could impact the outcome.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America’s largest carmaker sets deadline
description: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all medals to Las Vegas thieves
description: Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole all her career medals while she was in Minnesota caring for her mother, who is also battling cancer. The burglary at her Las Vegas home revealed broken windows and destroyed security cameras, with surveillance footage indicating multiple individuals were involved over several days.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief's advice for teens; 'spend time on this skill'
description: Meta's AI chief, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, likening the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' – hands-on experimentation with AI – to gain a significant future economic advantage, much like early programmers did with computers.
